title: An Act to allow hardship licenses and interlocking ignition devices on motorcycles

abstracts.abstract: By Representative McKenna of Sutton, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3740) of Joseph D. McKenna relative to hardship licenses and interlocking ignition devices on motorcycles.  Transportation.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Transportation
